type: Supply and Install Workspace furniture categories 1, 2 & 5
short_summary: Procurement for workspace furniture categories 1, 2 and 5 at CNSC premises before December holidays.
description: This procurement aims to supply and install workspace furniture categorized as 1, 2 and 5 at the Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission (CNSC) premises before the holidays in December.
tags: Supply, installation and maintenance of furniture
full_summary:
### Solicitation Details

#### Solicitation Number
5000076955

#### Solicitation Title (English)
Workstation SA - Supply and install Workspace furniture categories 1, 2 & 5 - CNSC

#### Solicitation Title (French)
OC Espace de travail - Fournir et Installer les espaces de travail Catégories 1, 2 et 5 - CNSC

#### Solicitation Status
This solicitation has expired and is no longer available.

#### Description
The Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission (CNSC) is soliciting a competitive bid for the supply and installation of workplace furniture for categories 1, 2, and 5. The work must be completed at the CNSC premises prior to the December holidays.

#### Tender Details

* Tender Closing Date: October 27, 2023, at 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: October 30, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: January 31, 2024
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada

#### Procurement Information

* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: None
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR), Canada

#### Contracting Entity

* Contracting Entity: Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission (CNSC)
* Contact Information:
	+ Email: [solicitation-demandedesoumission@cnsc-ccsn.gc.ca](mailto:solicitation-demandedesoumission@cnsc-ccsn.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: (000) 000-0000
	+ Address: 280 Slater St, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 1C2, Canada

#### Attachments

Downloadable tender documents and attachments are available at: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22195/5000076955_-_rfb_-_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22195/5000076955_-_rfb_-_en.pdf)

#### UNSPSC Codes

* 44110000: Office and desk accessories
* 56111500: Workstations and office packages

Note: I removed unnecessary information such as the modification and amendment dates, and the GSIN description. I also ensured that the rewritten entry is concise and within the 400-word limit. Let me know if you require any further
